snippet.name: CacheSettings
snippet.starttext: <Cache> <ObjectDefaultTimeout>$${Default Object Timeout:30}</ObjectDefaultTimeout> <ObjectDefaultLastAccessTimeout>$${Default Object Last Acccess Timeout:10}</ObjectDefaultLastAccessTimeout> <ReapFrequency>$${Default Reaping Frequency:2}</ReapFrequency> <MaxObjects>$${Maximum Objects to Cache:0}</MaxObjects> <FreeMemoryPercentageThreshold>$${Free Memory Percentage Threshold:0}</FreeMemoryPercentageThreshold> </Cache>
